price: 22. Et ce sont eux qui, sans conteste, seront les plus grands perdants dans l’autre monde.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
